experience: You and Wes both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Amanda Vega, and 42 others

Speed reading the political stuff two days ago, some words stuck, would not go away; “On one side it is Win-Lose, on the other it is Win-Win.”  This stuck with me because it applies to selling and every life situation.
Long lasting, happy relationships, “marriages” are always Win-Win.  Divorces are the result of Win-Lose.

The countless cases of “Buyer’s Remorse” result from Win Lose sales methods. This also applies in politics, marriage, business, anywhere thoughts and ideas are exchanged without agreement. Winners are never happy in these situations, losers often unconsciously, think about revenge.

When I began selling, the sales “experts” said that to win a sale the prospect had to be convinced.  Doing this required overcoming the prospect’s objections, and finally using one of seven psychological closes.

I learned to sell by becoming friends with prospects and learning about their hopes, which were the reason why they were looking for something like what I had and told them about.  Above all, I had to know that what I had would make their hopes come true, and walk away if not. It worked and made me happy, with many friends and money in my pocket.
Thirty years later I would realize that buying and selling are educational processes. That Leaders are educators and Managers are teachers.

I taught salespeople, managers, business owners, what worked by telling true stories of what I’d seen and done, so they could be happy and make their hopes into reality.  It worked and several of them wrote to tell me to write a book so others could have the happiness they had.

I listened, talked with the Spirit about it.  The book is still in print after helping several thousand people. I stopped marketing, telling you and others about it, while building a new life after widowhood.
You can read the book in one, 5 1/2, hour sitting, then you will read it again and again, for fun and happiness.  Buy it, The Perception of a Difference at 7one.com.
Leader in the production of Reconfigureyourlife.com

This is an intimate but public networking group devoted to helping others. We come together to get acquainted, share concerns, successes, problem and solution ideas.  But most importantly we inspire each other to be the best we can be.  Successful people learn from the experience of others.  Learn something new and useful from others.  Come share your insights and leave with renewed positive energy. JI&N meets at New York Bagels 'N Bialys, 10320 N. Scottsdale Rd., Scottsdale, 85253, south of Shea between Cochise and Gold Dust next to Total Wine every Thursday Morning at 7:15. No fee. A labor of love for me.

I have had the unique pleasure of working with Wes over the past 3 months since I joined his 7one.com Business Success Systems group locally in Scottsdale. Wes has served not only as a business advisor to me, but also as a mentor and an inspiration. As a young entrepreneur,  I sometimes question if I'm making the "right" decisions. Wes has always able to confidently say "yes!" More importantly, he can explain why. However, the true value in his advice and guidance is that he always recognizes and highlights areas that demand improvement. He keeps me motivated and at the same time, helps me grow.

Yes, I highly recommend Wes Zimmerman, for any considerations within the structures, systems, and processes of your business that you are trying to better understand.Wes has a way of listening, and hearing what is being said, and not said, in a conversation. He will ask you five questions about your business and you will begin seeing him for who he is - honest, concerned, genuine, and of an extremely high ethical and moral fabric. Wes' Perception of a Difference program is such a masterful program for turning businesses around. With a track record to prove it, he has been able to help virtually every business in a variety of industries that he has worked with.I have brought Wes in to consult and advise me with my own clients; have worked with Wes with his clients; and have begun learning the Perception of a Difference program myself. He is a wonderful teacher and tireless leader in the business development community. As Wes will say, "We don't know if we can help you. Only after listening to you and reviewing my notes will we know if we can, and how."If you are uncertain about any aspect of your business, HE CAN, help you.Tim HarringtonBusiness and Executive Success CoachBizfit Coaching

summary: My personal summary is very simple;  I've built my life satisfaction on helping others to succeed in business & life.  This is all that matters to me. I have earned enough to live a life filled with love and giving love.I've have helped people in 13 countries, nineteen industries and met more wonderful people than I can count.I have recorded what I have learned in many forms so that you and yours can use and benefit from it in your life.  I am still recording.  I make all of this available through the company doing business as 7one Business System, which charges a very fair price for each piece in the hope that you will benefit.WesWesley W. ZimmermanThe 7one SummaryIn today's language, we are turn around experts.  We change the way you and your people think,.. permanently.  You then let them turn the company around, with guidance from you.Eight people have written to tell us we have made them millionaires, others have told us we have made their lives happier, relationships stronger; caused them to realize their real purpose in life  These were business owners, Managers, Sales Professionals, individuals.This team will carry on the work I have been doing for 36 years and expand it into cities nationwide.  It is my way of preserving the usefulness of the methodology that has helped many hundreds of wonderful people to reach their goals in business and life.  Go to www.7one.com and learn about it, or contact me directly.If you want to know more about me personally, read on, please.  The important stuff is what this  team can do for you.Specialties: Helping you reach your goals, which may start with helping you to think about and maybe re-prioritize them.  After that we provide as much help as you request and in the form you choose.sales management education.helping you learn how to hire the correct people for you.professional sales,marketing,Sales training,sales process improvement, Business Improvement,
